#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstring>
#include <string>
#include <cctype>
#include <stack>
#include <queue>
#include <list>
#include <vector>
#include <map>
#include <sstream>
#include <cmath>
#include <bitset>
#include <utility>
#include <set>
#define pi acos(-1.0)
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
typedef vector <ll> vll;
typedef pair<long long,long long> pll;
typedef vector<pair<long long,long long> > vpll;
typedef set<long long> sll;
typedef map<string,long long> msll;
typedef map<char,long long> mcll;
typedef map<long long,long long>mll;
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define all(a) a.begin(),a.end() 
int main()
{
	ll n;
	scanf("%lld",&n);
	ll sum=(n*(n+1))/2;
	for(ll i=1;i<=(n/2);i++)
	{
		sum+=((n/i)-1)*i;//why -1 becase the number itself is already included
	}
	printf("%lld\n",sum);
	return 0;
}
